title: Old Trees on Ormsby's Farm
credit_line: Received from the Carnegie Museum of Natural History in exchange for Works from the Robert S. Waters Estate
provenance_text:
Historical Society of Western Pennsylvania [1859-], Pittsburgh, 1885 until 1897?; Carnegie Institute Museum of Natural History, Pittsburgh, by 1916 [1]; Museum by exchange, in 1975 [2]. 
NOTES:1. On loan to Carnegie Library, Pittsburgh, 1916-1975 2. Received from the Carnegie Museum of Natural History in exchange for works from the Robert S. Waters Estate
